pkgmetadata.longdescription: Evaluate the Geboes Score for Histology in Ulcerative Colitis // Evaluate and validate the Geboes score for histological assessment of inflammation in ulcerative colitis. The original Geboes score from Geboes, et al. (2000) doi:10.1136/gut.47.3.404, binary version from Li, et al. (2019) doi:10.1093/ecco-jcc/jjz022, and continuous version from Magro, et al. (2020) doi:10.1093/ecco-jcc/jjz123 are all described and implemented.
